title: Battle Angel Alita: Last Order Omnibus 1
description: When Doc Ido, a talented cyber-physician, finds Alita's head in a junk heap, she has lost all memory of her past life. But when he reconstructs her, she discovers her body still instinctively remembers the Panzer Kunst, the most powerful cyborg fighting technique ever known. In the post-apocalyptic world of the Scrapyard, as the secrets of Alita's past unfold, each day is a struggle for survival. - Battle Angel Alita: Last Order Omnibus 1 By Yukito Kishiro (Paperback)
author: Yukito Kishiro
